blog.name: blatherkatt
blog.title: i did a writing
blog.description:
Tumblr user happikattwuzheere does fanfictiony things.  

Drabble requests are cool, just keep in mind I might never get to them - if I get ideas from it, I'll write it, and if not, then oh well.  Just drop requests in the ask box and I'll do my best!

Fandom(s) I'm currently writing for:
Digimon Frontier, Homestuck  | Fandoms I might write for: Probably too many to list here; I love anything with fantasy elements, so if you have a particular fandom in mind, feel free to ask if it's something I'd be interested in doing drabbles/fics for!

D&D, Critical Role, Discworld. 
-
I create meta, gifsets, fanart and fanfiction.

My inbox is always open for prompts, and I love getting them... but no guarantees.

summary: Have you heard the theory that Sir Bertrand Bell was that guy who drew the three wishes card from grog. Which is why he could...
question: Have you heard the theory that Sir Bertrand Bell was that guy who drew the three wishes card from grog. Which is why he could fight but also why he seemed like he didn’t know what this kinda thing entailed.
answer:
Yes! I love it, it makes complete sense as well and I do love it when minor plot points come back with a revenge. 

A++ theory!

reblog.comment:
Yes! I love it, it makes complete sense as well and I do love it when minor plot points come back with a revenge. 

A++ theory!

trail.content_raw:
